00024 //----------------------------------------------------------
00025 MLine::MLine()
00026 : _dir( 0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f )
00027 , _pt( 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f )
00028 {
00029 
00030 }
00031 
00032 //----------------------------------------------------------
00033 MLine::MLine( const MVec3& dir, const MVec3& pt )
00034 : _dir( dir )
00035 , _pt( pt )
00036 {
00037         B_ASSERT( Abs( dir.MagSqr() - 1.0f ) < 0.001 );
00038 }
00039 
00040 //----------------------------------------------------------
00041 MLine::~MLine()
00042 {
00043 
00044 }

00047 //==========================================================
00049 //==========================================================
00050 
00051 //----------------------------------------------------------
00052 void
00053 MLine::SetDir( const MVec3& dir )
00054 {
00056         B_ASSERT( Abs( dir.MagSqr() - 1.0f ) < 0.001 );
00057         _dir = dir;
00058 }
00059 
00060 //----------------------------------------------------------
00061 float
00062 MLine::Dist( const MVec3& pt )
00063 {
00065         MVec3 hyp = ( pt - _pt );
00066         float t = _dir.Dot( hyp );
00067         return pt.Dist( t * _dir );
00068 }
00069 
00070 //----------------------------------------------------------
00071 bool
00072 MLine::IsCoLinear( const MLine& line, float tolerance ) const
00073 {
00074         if ( 1.0f - _dir.Dot( line._dir ) > tolerance )
00075                 return false;
00076 
00079         MVec3 dir = line._pt - _pt;
00080         dir.Normalize();
00081 
00083         return ( 1.0f - dir.Dot( _dir ) ) <= tolerance;
00084 }
00085 
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 void
00088 MLine::Load( UReader& reader )
00089 {
00090         _dir.Load( reader );
00091         _pt.Load( reader );
00092 }
00093 
00094 //----------------------------------------------------------
00095 void
00096 MLine::Save( UWriter& writer ) const
00097 {
00098         _dir.Save( writer );
00099         _pt.Save( writer );
00100 }
